REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0788 reute d f BC-<ASIX-SYSTEMS>-GETS-M 04-08 0085

TEXT.TITLE: <ASIX SYSTEMS> GETS MORE FINANCING
TEXT.BODY: ASIX Systems, a developer of test systems for ASIC devices, said it has received 4,800,000 dlrs in a second round of equity financing. The company said investors include first round participants Paragon Partners, Citicorp <CCI>, Vista Ventures, Rust Ventures and Orien Ventures, plus new investors North Carolina Bank Venture Co LP, RepublicBankCorp <RPT> and ECI Ventures. It said it has now raised total capitalization of 8,600,000 dlrs. Reuter
